trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_SEQ_00<tab>Wuk Lamat gazes up at the summit of Worqor Zormor.

TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_SEQ_01<tab>As you prepare to ascend the mountain, you are accosted by a hostile group of Yok Huy. Their leader proclaims his brethren the rightful overlords of Tural, and makes clear his intent to reignite their campaign of conquest with the death of the Third Promise. Before he can act on his threat, however, a monstrous bird swoops down to attack one of his men. Wuk Lamat springs into action, defending the giant from certain death, and befuddling her erstwhile antagonist with her reasons for doing so.
Leaving Alphinaud behind to tend to the injured─and the giants to puzzle over Wuk Lamat's unexpected behavior─you turn your attention back to the towering peak before you. Worqor Zormor looms impossibly high, yet if you are to reach the elector, what choice do you have but to start climbing...?
※To enlist your companion NPCs for this duty, speak with them near the entrance or access Duty Support via the main menu. Use the Duty Finder if you wish to complete the instance alongside fellow players.

TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_SEQ_02<tab>Although the path is long and arduous, you eventually reach the summit of Worqor Zormor where the High Luminary awaits your arrival. Gurfurlur gives you no time to rest, immediately demanding that Wuk Lamat demonstrate her worth through combat. With you fighting at her side, the Third Promise endures the grueling battle until the enormous giant is at last forced to his knees.

TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_SEQ_03<tab>Gurfurlur commends Wuk Lamat on her martial prowess. The ensuing conversation turns to the origins of the legend of the golden city, only to be interrupted by the appearance of Koana and his Archon allies. The High Luminary once more issues his challenge and, at the culmination of the battle, awards keystones to both successful claimants.
Having arrived earlier, an impatient Zoraal Ja steps forth and demands to be shown Gulool Ja Ja's living sepulchre─a monument to those who stood against the terrifying Valigarmanda. Curiosity over the names etched upon the stone is overshadowed by confusion when an unholy screech suddenly rends the air. Your sense of foreboding is confirmed when Alphinaud calls and urges you to hurry back to Worlar's Echo. Valigarmanda, the Skyruin, has broken free.

TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_SEQ_04<tab>Alphinaud describes a sudden surge in aether that drew him back to the village, but by the time he returned, all hells had broken loose. Before you can delve into the cause of this chaos, however, there are wounded to attend to.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_TODO_00<tab>Enter Worqor Zormor.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_TODO_01<tab>Enter Worqor Zormor.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_KRILE_000_001<tab>The true size of a mountain is never more apparent than when you're standing right at its foot...

TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_ERENVILLE_000_005<tab>I fear I won't be of much use to you as a guide past this point. Even in Tuliyollal, there is precious little written about the sacred peak of Worqor Zormor. Beyond whimsical poetry, that is.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>I cast a rejuvenating spell on Wuk Lamat. Even our indomitable Third Promise is feeling the strain of these slopes.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>I hope we come across Bakool Ja Ja on our way to the summit─we still owe him for the troubles he caused us in Kozama'uka.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_VORPORLOR_000_020<tab>I set out to kill Tuliyollal's favorite daughter this day. To be aided by her instead was...unexpected.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_VORPORLOR_000_025<tab>I will not harm you or yours until this debt is repaid.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>I will tend to this one's wounds. Go on ahead with the others.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_ERENVILLE_000_035<tab>As I've said before, I am no fighter. I'll follow from a distance and keep well out of your way.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_A1_000_001<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_A1_000_002<tab>Form a party and enter Worqor Zormor.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_WUKLAMAT_000_040<tab>We'll be seeing you soon, Gurfurlur!
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_KRILE_000_045<tab>That bird must roost somewhere on the mountain. We'll need to be wary of the skies, as well.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_ALISAIE_000_050<tab>While I didn't mind guarding Erenville on the river, I look forward to swinging a blade on the front lines this time!
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>Stay with me! We'll have a healer see to you soon!
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_KRILE_000_075<tab>There, that should help. Rest awhile, and you'll be back on your feet in no time.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_ERENVILLE_000_080<tab>This is a Sharlayan restorative potion. Drink it slowly.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_ALISAIE_000_085<tab>You'll be fine. Just try to avoid sudden movements so you don't reopen your wounds.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_KOANA_000_090<tab>Urianger says fire aether pervades the entire village. What happened here...?
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_THANCRED_000_095<tab>Many of the villagers sustained burns, but the fire found no purchase in these stone buildings. A small mercy.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_URIANGER_000_100<tab>Though Valigarmanda's escape is of dire concern, we must needs tend to those caught in the conflagration.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_ALPHINAUD_000_105<tab>Good, you're back.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_ALPHINAUD_000_106<tab>There is much I would explain, but by the time I arrived to investigate a sudden surge in aether, there were already fallen giants everywhere.
TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_ALPHINAUD_000_107<tab>Right now, everyone is preoccupied with treating the wounded. Pray catch your breath, and then lend a hand where you can.

TEXT_KINGMB112_04891_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>You may now enter Worqor Zormor with a party of NPC avatars. To make use of this feature, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Trust<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
